title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 171.1 - Inspection of financial accounts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 171.1 - Inspection of financial accounts

State Regulations

The district superintendent shall from time to time during
each year inspect the financial accounts and vouchers of the district officers
of the several districts within his jurisdiction. If he finds that such
accounts are not kept in accordance with the law and the Regents rules, and
such district officers neglect and refuse to so keep the accounts, he shall
forthwith report the fact to the Commissioner of Education. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
171.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
